description: Daria Tomenko obtains access to a hidden Halden Protocol archive linked to the BCI, after being prompted by clues left in covert messages among the vanished.
Daria decides to release Haldens incriminating recordings, coordinating quietly with Oksana Lintz to authenticate and prepare the files for public broadcast.
Haldens recordings are broadcast citywide, exposing years of Council corruption and manipulation. The revelations ignite mass outrage and demand for justice.

Public anger erupts into protest. Thousands occupy city squares, demanding Council resignations, justice for the vanished, and full investigation of BCI abuses. Vanished citizens and civic leaders take prominent roles.

The Council, facing overwhelming public pressure and internal fracture, dissolves itself. An interim citizen assembly, including vanished and reformist leaders, assumes control to restore civic order and launch a truth and reconstruction process.
